scripts.clearResults: cross-env testEnv=int03 npx playwright test clear_results.spec.js --project=chromium
scripts.dryrun: cross-env testEnv=load01 npx playwright test Load01-dry-run.spec.js
scripts.fiesta: cross-env testEnv=int03 npx playwright test REL42-fiesta-fever-iframe.spec.ts --repeat-each=20
scripts.pbb: cross-env testEnv=int03 npx playwright test REL42-piggy-bank-bucks-iframe.spec.ts --repeat-each=20
scripts.bnk: cross-env testEnv=int03 npx playwright test REL42-big-number-knockout-iframe.spec.ts --repeat-each=20
scripts.iframeSpec: cross-env testEnv=int03 npx playwright test REL42/FpgIframeSpec --repeat-each=20
